experience.title: Redefine
experience.subtitle: the Dimensions of Beauty
experience.description: True luxury lies in making beauty a precise and predictable science.

origin.title: Brand Vision
origin.subtitle: Metamorphosis from Aesthetic Clinic to Cellular Laboratory. It all began with a dialogue between two spaces.
description: When medicine meets aesthetics, a revolutionary vision was born:
Translating the precision efficacy of aesthetic clinics into oral cellular-level nutritional directives.
After seven years of R&D, Fantasy Care embarked on the concept of "Luxurious Nourishment from Within," pioneering a new era of oral medical aesthetics.

scientificExploration.title: Rooted in Medicine, Refined by Science
scientificExploration.subtitle: Synergy. For Ultimate Regeneration.

luxuryCare.primaryText: True luxurious care lies not in confrontation, but in nourishment;
luxuryCare.secondaryText: Brilliant regeneration comes not from hasty display, but from internal order.

developmentHistory.title: Medical Inspiration
description: Born from a revolutionary insight in a New Zealand dermatological laboratory: True beauty stems from the reconstruction of internal cellular order. We aspire to integrate aesthetic medical effects into oral technology.

developmentHistory.title: System Forging
description: Established a comprehensive pharmaceutical grade R&D and supply chain system, defining internal beauty with the rigorous standards of pharmaceuticals—laying a solid cornerstone of trust for every commitment.

developmentHistory.title: Ceremony
description: A new milestone in luxurious, ultimate rejuvenating and regenerating technology. Through the cherished Platinum Supreme Intensive Repair Essence, Dr. Niehans' enduring dream reaches its peak.

developmentHistory.title: Global Certification
description: The entire product line has been awarded New Zealand GMP, HACCP, and Halal certifications, with quality earning international recognition. Business has steadily expanded to key markets in Asia-Pacific and Europe, establishing a global benchmark for scientific brands.

developmentHistory.title: Endless Exploration
description: We continue to delve into the forefront of skin science and nutrition, reshaping the future boundaries of beauty through relentless scientific research.

drShona.name: Dr Shona Dalzell
background: Graduated from the University of Auckland in 1993
A member of the New Zealand Society of Aesthetic Medicine (NZSCM) and holding a diploma in aesthetic medicine
Bachelor of Medicine and Bachelor of Surgery (MBChB)
Fellow of the Royal College of General Practitioners of New Zealand (FRNZGP)
Member of the New Zealand Skin Cancer Medical Association (MNZSCM)
Certified Skin Cancer Specialist (MACP) by the Chinese Medical Doctor Association
Certified Skin Cancer Specialist, Venous Disease Specialist, Certified Sclerotherapy Specialist, Venous Medicine Specialist, Aesthetic Medicine Specialist

clinicalCooperation.title: Medical Aesthetic Clinical Cooperation
clinicalCooperation.description: Jointly launched packages such as "Oral + Photofacial" with renowned clinics including CACI, Skin Institute The Cosmetic Clinic, and KAIZ Skin Body & Injectable Clinic. Physician Education System: Launched the "Global Oral Medical Aesthetics Physician Certification Program", trained over 2,000 dermatologists and developed an AI-assisted decision-making system.

awards.name: 2025 Southern Cross International Medical Aesthetics Gold Award
2025 New Zealand Silver Fern Award for Dietary Nutritional Supplements
Princess of Monaco Pinnacle Award for Anti-Aging Formula Innovation
Switzerland Nutritional Innovation Technology Gold Award
Annual Influential Benchmark Brand | European Nutrition & Health Summit
Annual Consumer-Trusted Oral Brand | International Beauty Industry Innovation Award
Milan, Italy Global Dietary Supplement Invention Grand Award
